mapper.update: update news_article_pictures set picturesName = #{picturesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picturesUrl = #{picturesurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picturesSort = #{picturessort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, articleId = #{articleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where picturesId = #{picturesid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select picturesId, picturesName, picturesUrl, picturesSort, state, articleId from news_article_pictures
